content.description: The velocity of an object as a function of time is shown in the graph.
content.question: Which of the following is most nearly the average acceleration of the object?

choices.label: <math alttext="1.5 meters per second squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>1.5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><msup><mtext>m/s</mtext><mn>2</mn></msup></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="3 meters per second squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>3</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><msup><mtext>m/s</mtext><mn>2</mn></msup></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="9 meters per second squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>9</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><msup><mtext>m/s</mtext><mn>2</mn></msup></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="24 meters per second squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>24</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><msup><mtext>m/s</mtext><mn>2</mn></msup></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="1.5 meters per second squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>1.5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><msup><mtext>m/s</mtext><mn>2</mn></msup></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
